academic.title: Notess - Note Taking Web Application
academic.description: Full-stack note-taking web application with CRUD operations, user authentication, and modern responsive design for efficient personal note management.
academic.longDescription: Notess is a comprehensive note-taking web application built with React and Node.js. The application provides a seamless user experience for creating, editing, organizing, and managing personal notes. Features include user authentication, real-time note operations, search functionality, and a clean, responsive interface optimized for both desktop and mobile devices. The backend API handles secure data operations with proper validation and error handling.

images.alt: Notess Main Interface - Note Taking Application
images.caption: Clean and intuitive note-taking interface with modern design

highlights: Full CRUD operations for note management

academic.title: OMR Grading System
academic.description: Advanced Optical Mark Recognition system using traditional computer vision pipeline for automated grading of multiple-choice answer sheets with 95%+ accuracy.
academic.longDescription: A sophisticated OMR (Optical Mark Recognition) system built with traditional computer vision techniques for automated grading of multiple-choice answer sheets. The system implements a 4-phase modular pipeline: Edge Detection → Rectangle Filtering → Perspective Transform → Grid Analysis. Achieves exceptional performance with 100% success rate on test samples, processing time under 0.1 seconds per sheet, and 95%+ accuracy in bubble detection. Built for academic coursework in Digital Image Processing with emphasis on OpenCV and traditional computer vision methods.

images.alt: OMR Grading System - Computer Vision Pipeline
images.caption: Advanced OMR system with 4-phase computer vision pipeline

academic.title: Laptop Recommendation System - Backend API
academic.description: FastAPI backend system for laptop recommendations using multi-criteria decision making with budget filtering and persona-based recommendations.
academic.longDescription: A backend API system for laptop recommendations built with FastAPI and Python. Currently implements Phase 1 with budget-based filtering and persona-based recommendations (Student, Professional, Gamer). Features include RESTful API endpoints, SQLite database with laptop specifications, CORS support for frontend integration, and comprehensive API documentation. Phase 2 will implement the full Fuzzy-TOPSIS algorithm for advanced multi-criteria decision making with linguistic variables and uncertainty handling.

images.caption: FastAPI backend with comprehensive API documentation

academic.title: Brandu - E-Commerce Platform
academic.description: Academic e-commerce web application project focusing on UI/UX design and web programming fundamentals with modern frontend technologies.
academic.longDescription: Brandu is an e-commerce platform developed as part of UI and Web Programming coursework. The project demonstrates proficiency in frontend web development, responsive design principles, and user interface creation. Features include product catalog display, shopping cart functionality, user-friendly navigation, and modern web design patterns. Built with emphasis on clean code structure and responsive design implementation.

images.caption: Modern e-commerce interface with responsive design

personal.title: Maguru - Rental Clothing Management System
personal.description: Comprehensive web-based rental management system for clothing rental operations with inventory tracking, customer management, and transaction processing.
personal.longDescription: Maguru is a full-stack rental clothing management system built with Next.js and modern web technologies. The system handles complete rental operations including product catalog management with size-aware inventory, customer registration and management, transaction lifecycle from rental to return, penalty calculation for late returns and damaged items, and financial reporting. Features a modular architecture with role-based access control for different user types (Owner, Producer, Kasir).
